author: Simon Difford
description: A Margarita with a touch of smoky character and plenty of warming oomph. It crossed my mind that whatever "oomph" is in Spanish would be a fitting name for this Margarita, so I hit Google Translate and amusingly it came back with "atracción sexual". Hence, instead of a mere "Smoky Chili Margarita", this became the Atracción Ahumado (Smoky Attraction).
name: Atracción Ahumado Margarita
recipeIngredient: 2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
